product_name: Klean Kanteen Classic Water Bottle with Loop Cap - 27 fl. oz. - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Great for traveling or just taking to the gym, the durable, stainless-steel 27-oz. Klean Kanteen Classic water bottle with loop cap holds cold beverages without the unpleasant aftertaste of plastic. Bottle is made of tough 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that is BPA free and unlined. Painted exterior is an acrylic, resin-based finish that is totally free of lead and other toxins (hand washing is recommended for painted bottles). Bottle mouth measures 1.75 in. and is easy to drink from directly and sized to accept ice cubes; polypropylene screw cap is easy to grip and seals tight to prevent leaks. Loop top lets you attach the bottle to a backpack or belt loop using a carabiner (not included). Slim design fits neatly in standard sport bottle carriers and bicycle bottle cages. Please note: This Klean Kanteen bottle is single walled and is not intended for use with hot liquids. Closeout.
